name: Roaring Flame Vents
description: Openings where fire elementals or magical flames emerge create dangerous but potentially useful energy sources. The fire magic and heat-resistant materials provide unique opportunities for crafting and magical research, while the extreme heat and fire elementals create constant danger.
atmosphere: Magical flames erupt from earth vents in colors beyond natural fire while the roar echoes like dragon breath. Sulfur and pure fire scents fill the superheated air as heat-resistant equipment lies scattered around the vents. Even distant approach risks severe burns. Otherworldly flames burn without fuel or oxygen.
